recipesJson.name: Strawberry Cookie
recipesJson.author: WoodChopper
recipesJson.description:
This is a a test/play around with flavours in my currently small (but growing) collection. 

I applied the tried and true strawberry combination I found in Skiddlzninja's God Milk in the use of TFA's Strawberry, Strawberry (Ripe) and Dragonfruit, which I adore. 
Looking through my small but growing collection I thought hey, maybe I could make a strawberry cookie? (which isn't really a thing but hey) 
Surprisingly, it's pretty spot on. The cookie is present throughout the vape with its delicious buttery notes, gently enveloped in strawberry goodness. 
I added FA Meringue to add an extra lightness and sweetness to the mix. 

Quite pleased with it at a first go at trying to create something. I haven't added nicotine purely because I'm testing the combination of flavours themselves.

reviews.text: This was next in my "What can I make" list, so I gave it a shot.  It's a real nice mellow strawberry mix.  I gave it a quick heat steep, and it really does remind me of God Milk.   The meringue was a nice choice; being a recipe under 8% it has a good amount of sweetness and flavor.  I don't know if this will make my rotation, but I dig it.  Well done.
